chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
L: Language

Goal:
forall t : fol.Term L, subAllTerm t (fun x : nat => fol.var L x) = t

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Module fol := Struct Record Language : Type := language { Relations : Set; Functions : Set; arity : Relations + Functions -> nat } Definition Relations : Language -> Set. Definition Functions : Language -> Set. Definition arity : forall l : Language, Relations l + Functions l -> nat. Inductive Term (L : Language) : Set := var : nat -> Term L | apply : forall f : Functions L, Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> Term L with Terms (L : Language) : nat -> Set := Tnil : Terms L 0 | Tcons : forall n : nat, Term L -> Terms L n -> Terms L (S n) Definition Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (apply L
Notation var := (fol.var L)
subAllTerm = fix subAllTerm (t : fol.Term L) : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Term L := match t with | @fol.var _ x => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => m x | @fol.apply _ f ts => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => fol.apply L f (subAllTerms (arity L (inr f)) ts m) end with subAllTerms (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) {struct ts} : (nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n := match ts in (fol.Terms _ n0) return ((nat -> fol.Term L) -> fol.Terms L n0) with | @Tnil _ => fun _ : nat -> fol.Term L => Tnil L | @Tcons _ n' t ss => fun m : nat -> fol.Term L => Tcons L
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
subSubAllTerm : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerm L (subAllTerm t m) v s = subAllTerm t (fun n : nat => substituteTerm L (m n) v s)
subAllTerm_ext : forall (t : fol.Term L) (m1 m2 : nat -> fol.Term L), (forall m : nat, In m (freeVarTerm L t) -> m1 m = m2 m) -> subAllTerm t m1 = subAllTerm t m2
Formula_depth_rec_indep : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (rec : forall a : fol.Formula L, (forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b) -> Q a -> P a), (forall (a : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : forall b : fol.Formula L, lt_depth L b a -> Q b -> P b), (forall (b : fol.Formula L) (p : lt_depth L b a) (q : Q b), z1 b p q = z2 b p q) -> forall q : Q a, rec a z1 q = rec a z2 q) -> forall (a : fol.Formula L) (q : Q a), Formula_depth_rec L (fun x : fol.Formula L => Q x -> P x) rec a q = rec a (fun (b : fol.Formula L) (_ : lt_depth...
subTermVar2 : forall (L : Language) (v x : nat) (s : fol.Term L), v <> x -> substituteTerm L (fol.var L x) v s = fol.var L x
Formula_depth_rec2_imp : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g...
subAllFormula = fix subAllFormula (f : fol.Formula L) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) {struct f} : fol.Formula L := match f with | @fol.equal _ t s => fol.equal L (subAllTerm t m) (subAllTerm s m) | @fol.atomic _ r ts => fol.atomic L r (subAllTerms (arity L (inl r)) ts m) | @fol.impH _ f0 g => fol.impH L (subAllFormula f0 m) (subAllFormula g m) | @fol.notH _ f0 => fol.notH L (subAllFormula f0 m) | @fol.forallH _ n f0 => let nv := newVar (freeVarFormula L f0 ++ freeVarMap (freeVarFormula L (fol.forallH L n f0)) m) in fol.forallH L nv (subAllFormula f0 (fun v : nat => if Nat.eq_dec v n...
Formula_depth_rec2_forall : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P...
Formula_depth_rec2_not : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g -> P g...
subTermId : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat), substituteTerm L t v (fol.var L v) = t
Term_Terms_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_Terms_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Formula_depth_rec2rec_nice : forall (L : Language) (Q P : fol.Formula L -> Set) (f1 : forall t t0 : fol.Term L, Q (fol.equal L t t0) -> P (fol.equal L t t0)) (f2 : forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), Q (fol.atomic L r t) -> P (fol.atomic L r t)) (f3 : forall f : fol.Formula L, (Q f -> P f) -> forall f0 : fol.Formula L, (Q f0 -> P f0) -> Q (fol.impH L f f0) -> P (fol.impH L f f0)), (forall (f g : fol.Formula L) (z1 z2 : Q f -> P f), (forall q : Q f, z1 q = z2 q) -> forall z3 z4 : Q g ->...
Term_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> SProp), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Type), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> forall t : fol.Term L, P t
subTermTrans : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v1 v2 : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v2 (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v1 (freeVarTerm L t)) -> substituteTerm L (substituteTerm L t v1 (fol.var L v2)) v2 s = substituteTerm L t v1 s
subTermNil : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> substituteTerm L t v s = t
freeVarSubTerm3 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> In x (list_remove nat Nat.eq_dec v (freeVarTerm L t)) \/ In x (freeVarTerm L s)
freeVarSubTerm1 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L t) -> v <> x -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
fol.var : forall L : Language, nat -> fol.Term L
Formula_rec : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Set), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_sind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> SProp), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_rect : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Type), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
Formula_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Formula L -> Prop), (forall t t0 : fol.Term L, P (fol.equal L t t0)) -> (forall (r : Relations L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inl r))), P (fol.atomic L r t)) -> (forall f1 : fol.Formula L, P f1 -> forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.impH L f1 f2)) -> (forall f2 : fol.Formula L, P f2 -> P (fol.notH L f2)) -> (forall (n : nat) (f3 : fol.Formula L), P f3 -> P (fol.forallH L n f3)) -> forall f4 : fol.Formula L, P f4
freeVarSubTerm2 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L s) -> In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s))
Terms_Term_rec_full : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Set) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Set), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
Terms_Term_ind : forall (L : Language) (P : fol.Term L -> Prop) (P0 : forall n : nat, fol.Terms L n -> Prop), (forall n : nat, P (fol.var L n)) -> (forall (f0 : Functions L) (t : fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f0))), P0 (arity L (inr f0)) t -> P (fol.apply L f0 t)) -> P0 0 (Tnil L) -> (forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Term L), P t -> forall t0 : fol.Terms L n, P0 n t0 -> P0 (S n) (Tcons L n t t0)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : fol.Terms L n), P0 n t
freeVarSubTerm4 : forall (L : Language) (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L) (x : nat), In x (freeVarTerm L (substituteTerm L t v s)) -> ~ In v (freeVarTerm L t) -> In x (freeVarTerm L t)
subSubAllTerms : forall (n : nat) (ts : fol.Terms L n) (m : nat -> fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), substituteTerms L n (subAllTerms n ts m) v s = subAllTerms n ts (fun n0 : nat => substituteTerm L (m n0) v s)

```coq
Proof.
intro t.
induction t.
- simpl. reflexivity.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHt. auto.
Qed.

original: intro t. induction t. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite <- IHt. auto.
